full_summary:
================

[Rénovations to Government of Canada Building in Barrington, Nova Scotia][1]

**Invitation for Tender (ITF) Details**

* **Reference Number:** cb-8445-60688658
* **Solicitation Number:** M4000-4-1492
* **Publication Date:** August 24, 2023
* **Closing Date:** September 8, 2023 (13:00:00)
* **Amendment Date:** September 8, 2023

**Project Description**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) seeks a contractor to provide construction services for interior renovations to the RCMP Detachment in Barrington, Nova Scotia. The successful bidder will be required to complete the works within 21 weeks from the contract award date.

**Selection Process**

This is a two-phase selection process. Bidders must submit a bid in two phases. The detailed requirements and evaluation criteria can be found in the attached Invitation to Tender document.

**Security Requirements**

The personnel of the successful bidder, as well as any subcontractor and its personnel required to perform any part of the work, must meet the mandatory security requirements stipulated in the Invitation to Tender document.

**Contact Information**

For further information, please contact:

Sandra Bremner
A/C Coordinator
RCMP Bid Receiving Unit
80 Garland Ave, H-066
Dartmouth, NS B3B 0J8
Phone: (902) 717-5395
Email: ATL_Procurement@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

**Submissions**

Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit via email at ATL_Procurement@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.

**Language of Submission**

Tenders may be submitted in either English or French.

**Indigenous Procurement**

The RCMP has adopted the Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) as a resource for identifying Indigenous business capacity. Bidders are encouraged to register their company in the IBD to increase their visibility and access to government contracting opportunities.

[1]: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities
